(:action set ; Set up an association between entities
:parameters (?entity1 - agent ?entity2 - agent)
:precondition (and (not (associated ?entity1 ?entity2)))
:effect (and (associated ?entity1 ?entity2))

(:action talk ; Talk to another entity and update interaction status
  :parameters (?speaker - person ?listener - person ?context - context)
  :precondition (and (in ?speaker ?context) (in ?listener ?context) (not (talking ?speaker ?listener ?context)))
  :effect (talking ?speaker ?listener ?context)
)

(:action gather ; Gather resources and update task status
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (not (gathered ?item)))
  :effect (gathered ?item)
)
